sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_15b0c74f1bc35e1058b75adb234bcb7f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_tygr_check_record</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_tygr_check_record">stateINClosed Complete,Closed Incomplete,Approved,Rejected,Cancelled,Error,No Longer Required^EQ<item display_value="Closed Complete,Closed Incomplete,Approved,Rejected,Cancelled,Error,No Longer Required" endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="IN" or="false" value="Closed Complete,Closed Incomplete,Approved,Rejected,Cancelled,Error,No Longer Required"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>CLP Record Complete (Global)</name><order>500</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
    // Add your code here
    var rec = new GlideRecord(current.parent_table);
    if (rec.isValid()) {
        if (rec.get(current.parent + '')) {
            var wf = new global.Workflow().getRunningFlows(rec);
            while (wf.next()) {
                new global.Workflow().broadcastEvent(wf.sys_id, 'tygr.clp.CLPRecordCompleted');
            }
        } else {
            gs.error('CLP Record Complete BR. Could not find parent record (' + current.parent_table + '): ' +
                current.parent);
        }
    } else {
        gs.error('CLP Record Complete BR. Invalid Parent Table: ' + current.parent_table);
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>ty.roach</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-01-17 01:32:13</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>15b0c74f1bc35e1058b75adb234bcb7f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CLP Record Complete (Global)</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_15b0c74f1bc35e1058b75adb234bcb7f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>ty.roach</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-01-17 02:38:54</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=15b0c74f1bc35e1058b75adb234bcb7f"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_relationship"><sys_relationship action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><advanced>false</advanced><apply_to/><basic_apply_to>kb_knowledge</basic_apply_to><basic_query_from>x_tygr_check_record</basic_query_from><insert_callback/><name>CLP KB Approval</name><query_from/><query_with><![CDATA[(function refineQuery(current, parent) {

	// Add your code here, such as current.addQuery(field, value);
	current.addEncodedQuery('parent='+parent.sys_id);

})(current, parent);]]></query_with><reference_field/><related_list/><simple_reference>false</simple_reference><sys_class_name>sys_relationship</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>ty.roach</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-01-16 14:38:46</sys_created_on><sys_id>932becc31bc79e101e8a5315604bcb35</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CLP KB Approval</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_relationship_932becc31bc79e101e8a5315604bcb35</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>ty.roach</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-01-16 14:38:46</sys_updated_on></sys_relationship><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=932becc31bc79e101e8a5315604bcb35"/></record_update>
